content.html: Graham Norton: “People should be accountable for the things they say, and we should listen to trans people about matters that affect their lives.” Billy Bragg: “I agree with this.” Billionaire bigot lady: “Omg I can’t believe these MEN with their BEARDS are condoning RAPE.”
content.value:
Graham Norton: “People should be accountable for the things they say, and we should listen to trans people about matters that affect their lives.”

Billy Bragg: “I agree with this.”

Billionaire bigot lady: “Omg I can’t believe these MEN with their BEARDS are condoning RAPE.”
